title: Handle Customer Account Reactivation
description: A former customer wants to start ordering again. An agent must reactivate their old account.

tasks.description: Find the customer's old, inactive account.
Verify the customer's information and check if a new credit check is needed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer's details and determines a new credit check is required due to the time elapsed.

tasks.description: Reactivate the customer's account in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully marks the account as 'active'.
